Uses of Package
android.health.pedometer

Packages that use android.health.pedometer
android.health.pedometer   
 

Classes in android.health.pedometer used by android.health.pedometer
DistanceChecker
          This class is responsible for abstracting all sensor handling away from the rest of the core pedometer components (ExerciseSession, ExcerciseSessionList, and ExcerciseSessionInfo).
DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
          This simple interface simply forms a mechanism for DistanceChecker to update external objects as the distance traveled figure changes.
DistanceNotifier.Listener
           
ExcerciseSession
          This class encapsulates the core information about a particular exercise session and obtains the estimated number of calories the user burned during the session.
ExcerciseSessionInfo
          This class stores the core information about the exercise itself from the exercise session: estimated distance, time taken, method taken to estimate distance, average estimated speed, max estimated speed, minimum estimated speed, etc.
StepListener
          Interface implemented by classes that can handle notifications about steps.
StepService.ICallback
